title: Fps lag on a pretty decent computer
body:
Specs:
1050 TI
i5-7500

ok so for like half the game im doin fine 200 fps and everything, then literally half way through the game i get like 5 fps and it spikes up and down, i literally dont have anything in the backround that would affect my gameplay. also all my drivers are updated, pls help

replies.body: Yea that seems pretty wonky without much more details for sure. At first thought it makes me feel like some game file that's loading during the game might be a little bugged and causing those frame drops. Run a quick repair if you can, but also hit up the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some other pretty basic troubleshooting steps you can try as well.
Similar i5, same card same problem ;p
